member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.Words(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a number of lorem ipsum words with out HTML formatting
member.example:
To Create: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
@Html.Ipsum().Words(5)

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.Paragraphs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a number of lorem ipsum paragraphs with out HTML formating
member.example:
To create five paragraphs that will NOT be nested in HTML 'p' tags.
@Html.Paragraphs(5)

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.h1(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets an h1 element containing lorem ipsum
member.example: To create an HTML h1 tag containing Lorem Ipsum. @Html.h1()
To create an HTML h1 tag containing three Lorem Ipsum words and with attributes. @Html.h1(3, new { @class = "my-css-class"})

member.summary: Gets an h2 element containing lorem ipsum
member.example: To create an HTML h2 tag containing Lorem Ipsum. @Html.h2()

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.p(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a p element containing lorem ipsum
member.example: To create 3 paragraphs each 6 sentences nested in HTML 'p' tags. @Html.p(3, 6)

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.ul(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a ul element containing lorem ipsum
member.example: To create a unordered list of Lorem Ipusm nested in HTML 'ul' tags.@Html.ul()
member.param: Number of list items to create
List item will contain a link, ex: href="#"

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.ol(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a ol element containing lorem ipsum
member.example: To create a unordered list of Lorem Ipusm nested in HTML 'ol' tags.@Html.ol()
member.param: Number of list items to create
List item will contain a link, ex: href="#"

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.dl(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Object,System.Object)

member.example: To create a unordered list of Lorem Ipusm nested in HTML 'dl' tags.@Html.dl()

member.name: M:Prototyping.Ipsum.Ipsum.BlogPost
member.summary: Gets a static set of HTML paragraphs that resemble a blog post. (500 words with links and strong tags)
